thread.title_full: Take Charge America reviewed by Ilissa

author: Ilissa
title: Ilissa
text:
Take Charge America, for what I consider to be a nominal fee, worked with me on a budget and then basically took over the process of dealing with those awful crook creditors, saved me a lot of stress, headache, and a ton of money.
It was not an easy process..giving up credit cards and realizing how much I relied upon them, but in the end it was worth the process and helped me to have an even newer-found respect for the dollar. There is no way I could have paid off almost $40,000 in less than 4 years on my own.
I highly recommend them. Their customer service is great, they were very kind and worked with me on the few occasions I needed to make adjustments. If you are willing to sacrifice some things which you might not see as "luxuries" and put your mind to it, TCA can be very instrumental in helping you with reducing or eliminating your credit card debt.
